dm.welcome_joined:
Welcome to the server! While you complete verification, you can chat in <#{{lobby_channel_id}}>.

Please reply with your residence hall from: {{hall_list}}.
dm.ask_hall: Welcome! Which hall are you in? Reply with one of: {{hall_list}}. You might find this information on the packet from which your key was delivered.
dm.invalid_hall: "{{input}}" isn't a recognized hall. Please enter one of: {{hall_list}}.
dm.ask_room_number: Got it — {{hall}}. What's your room number? (Just the 3 digits, like {{example}}). You might find this information on the packet from which your key was delivered.
dm.invalid_room_number: That doesn't look like a valid room number. Please enter 3 digits (e.g., {{example}}).
dm.ask_unit: Thanks! What's your unit letter? (A, B, C, or D). You might find this information on the packet from which your key was delivered.
dm.invalid_unit: Unit must be a single letter A-D. Please reply with just the letter (e.g., {{example}}).
dm.invalid_room: That room format doesn't look right. Expected something like {{room_example}} (e.g., F-312-A). Try again.
dm.await_ra_notice: Thanks! We’ve pinged the {{hall}} RA to verify {{room}}. We’ll update you here.
dm.reminder_user: Still working on it — your {{hall}} verification for {{room}} is awaiting RA review. No action needed from you.
dm.approved: ✅ Verified for {{hall}} {{room}}. Your access has been upgraded — welcome!
dm.denied: ❌ Verification was denied by the RA. Reason: {{reason}}. If this seems wrong, reply here.
dm.expired: ⏳ This request expired after {{ttl_hours}} hours. Start again with {{start_command}}.
dm.already_in_progress: You already have a verification in progress for {{term}}. We’ll notify you once it’s resolved.
dm.system_error: We hit a snag processing your request. Please try again shortly.

ra_queue.unauthorized_attempt: ⚠️ Blocked unauthorized action by {{actor_tag}} on case {{case_id}}.
